member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.CreateWholesaleRequest.WholesaleState
member.summary:
WholesaleState
1 => no branch(no channel), no option
2 => no branch, all option
3 => no branch, specific option
4 => all branch, no option
5 => all branch, all option
6 => all branch, specific option
7 => specific branch, no option
8 => specific branch, all option
9 => specific branch, specific option

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.DeleteProductCategoryRequest.RequestType
member.summary: 0 for simple delete 1 for delete even it is used in product

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GenerateSkuRequest.ProductId
member.summary:
if create product, productId = 0
if update product, productId != 0

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetProductCategoryListRequest.RequestType
member.summary:
0 for list and save product dropdown
1 for save product catgory dropdown

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetProductInventoryResponse.Branches
member.summary:
if branches count > 0, NoBranch = null
priority 1 => Branches
priority 2 => No Branch

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetProductPricesResponse.UsedStateStatus
member.summary:
front end reqeust > for save state
1 => all branch, all sku
2 => all branch, different sku
3 => different branch, all sku
4 => different branch, different sku

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetProductsRequest.Filter
member.summary:
0 => all product type
1 => only reward 2 => pagination pagesize no limit

summary.p:
0 is most recent first(default), 1 for oldest first
2 for used, 3 for A-Z order, 4 for Z-A order

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetSkuNumbersResponse.AllBranch
member.summary:
if AllBranch != null, DifferentBranches = []
priority 1 => AllBranch
priority 2 => DifferentBranches

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetSupplierListRequest.SortingStatus
member.summary: 0 is most recently added(default) 1 is oldest first

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetTagListRequest.Statement
member.summary:
0 is most recent first(default), 1 for oldest first
2 for used (recent tag to add)

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetVariantTemplatesRequest.ReqestType
member.summary:
0 for manage list
1 for recent list in option

member.name: P:Vetail.API.Dtos.ProductDto.GetWholesaleRequest.ProductId
member.summary:
WholesaleState
0(default) => no branch(no channel), no option
1 => yes branch, no option
2 => no branch, yes option
3 => yes branch, yes option

member.summary:
